detail_desc: Long dress with a lace bodice partly lined in satin with side support and a concealed zip in one side. Short cap sleeves, a grosgrain seam at the waist and a lined, pleated skirt in chiffon.
Biker jacket in washed stretch twill with hard worn details and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Unlined.
Biker jacket in washed stretch twill with hard worn details and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Unlined.
Lace dress with a pleated skirt, short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Lace dress with a pleated skirt, short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and concealed zip in the side. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed superstretch denim with embroidered appliqués, an adjustable elasticated waist, a visible fly and small slits at the hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and flared legs with raw-edge hems.
3/4-length, slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
3/4-length, slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.

V-neck dress in a patterned weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Flounce around the neckline and over the shoulders, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the hem. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie-belt, asymmetric cut and a flounce trim. Unlined.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top. Short, narrow shoulder straps, an opening with a tie at the back of the neck and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist with a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Checked jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped jumper in a soft, rib knit with long sleeves and wrapover ribbing at the hem.
Cropped jumper in a soft, rib knit with long sleeves and wrapover ribbing at the hem.
Short, off-the shoulder top in soft, ribbed fabric with long sleeves.
Leggings in soft jersey with glittery threads. Concealed zip in the side.
Mini pouch bag in faux fur with a zip at the top, embroidery at the front and appliqués at the top. Size 5x6x9 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Jumper in a soft, airy, fine knit with sheer plumeti chiffon sleeves, a small frill trim over the shoulders and at the cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and decorative rings at the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and decorative rings at the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and decorative rings at the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and decorative rings at the sides.
Fully lined one-shoulder swimsuit with decorative rings and a cut-out section at one side.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and narrow sides.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Short skirt in woven fabric with multicoloured stripes at the sides and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a lace top layer, wrapover with buttons at the neck and a cut-out section at the back. Seam at the waist, concealed zip at the back and straight wide legs.

Chinos in soft washed cotton twill with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Chinos in soft washed cotton twill with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a concealed zip in the back, long raglan sleeves and close-fitting cuffs with covered buttons. Seam with pleats at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Tuxedo trousers woven in a cotton blend containing some linen with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with grosgrain stripes down the sides and creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
All-in-one suit in soft pile with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-in creases at the front and stirrups with adjustable fasteners.
Wide top in sturdy jersey with a stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with wide cuffs. Slightly shorter with a straight cut to the hem.
Wide, slightly shorter jumper knitted in a mohair blend with a deep V neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Wide, slightly shorter jumper knitted in a mohair blend with a deep V neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a narrow opening and concealed button at the top, wide, pleated 3/4-length sleeves, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, pleated skirt. Lined.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, decorative covered buttons at the top and short sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in patterned satin with a V-neck, sewn in wrapover at the front and short sleeves. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, a detachable tie belt and an asymmetric hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Knee-length, bell-shaped skirt in a printed weave with a concealed zip at the back and an asymmetric hem. Lined.

Knee-length skirt in airy, patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist, seam at the hips with a double wrapover and a concealed zip in the side. Jersey lining.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a patterned weave with a wrapover and concealed fastening at the front and ties at the sides. Unlined.
Wide trousers in an airy cotton and silk crêpe weave with a regular waist and pleats at the top. Side pockets, wide, straight legs and short inner trousers.
Velvet shoulder bag with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap, quilted flap with a magnetic fastener and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 4.5x10x19 cm.

Trousers in cotton twill with elastication at the back of the waist, a drawstring at the front and button fly. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud and shaping seams at the knees.

Trousers in cotton twill with elastication at the back of the waist, a drawstring at the front and button fly. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud and shaping seams at the knees.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with an opening and lacing at the sides.

Shirt in a textured cotton blend with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
